author: KareaGhandTrail
long_description:
## JP Player Name Transform your name to Japanese!
dont take this serious, this is a joke ### How to use Using `/toggle_jp` will toggle if translate your name or not
When true, your player name got replaced by the japanese name, as:
` Hi` ### Api Is very easy to use #### Tables Table `jnese_translate` has all keywords
Table `jnese` has all functions of the JP Pname mod #### Functions - `jnese.get_letter(letter)`: Returns the translation of a letter, example: jnese.get_letter("a") returns "ka" - `jnese.DoTransform(str)`: Translates the entire string, example: jnese.DoTransform("I do") returns "Ki temo" - `jnese.PlayerNameToJapanese(pname)`: Alias of `jnese.DoTransform(str)`
name: japanese_name
short_description: transform your player name to japaNESE (joke)
title: Japanese Name
